abstract.t: This document provides a proposal for a new Internet protocol,which should improve the relevance of results of search requestsfor information in the WWW. It contains a description of thebasic model and the minimum set of commands necessary to runproperly. It is neither meant to nor should be regarded as adefinitive version, but rather as a suggestion to a new way oflooking at the relations between the search engines on one handand hosts running WEB servers on the other.
